verses.roman:
śivānanda-sena kare saba samādhāna
ghāṭiyāla prabodhi' dena sabāre vāsā-sthāna

synonyms: śivānanda-sena—Śivānanda Sena; kare—does; saba samādhāna—all arrangements; ghāṭiyāla—the men in charge of levying taxes; prabodhi'-satisfying; dena—gives; sabāre—to everyone; vāsā-sthāna—resting places.
translation: As stated, Śivānanda Sena used to make all arrangements for the party's necessities. In particular, he used to pacify the men in charge of levying taxes, and he found resting places for everyone.
